body:
At the moment when we run the code from global installed command we do save logs in bin folder, which may be inconvenient and silently polute bin folder of app with logs - so they will slowly eat up the space without user noticing.

So if we run command as solve/hive, not the ./solve.mjs or ./hive.mjs we should be sure we put logs by default in the place where the globally installed command was executed.
title: Make logs be saved to current working directory, and make the path to log configurable with option for hive and solve commands
